Name: Discrete Tone Image Dataset
Abstract: Discrete Tone Images(DTI)are available which needs to be analyzed in detail. Here, we created this dataset for those who do research in DTI.
RelevantInfo: This dataset contains a total of 71 images including 11 types of images with its distorted versions. Each and every image has its own uniqueness of discrete tone image properties.

Acknowledgements: It has been decided to make the dataset available to the research community free of charge. If you use these images in your research, kindly cite this dataset link.
RelevantPapers: The parameters which we used to create this dataset is referred in the paper 'Compression Techniques are Lovable or Hateful: For Discrete Tone Images'. International conference on Electronics, Communication and Aerospace Technology (ICECA), IEEE.
AttributeInfo:
Types of Images
1.System Generated DTI by setting distinct pixel values 
2.Discrete Pixel Logo 
3.Business Charts
4.Bi-Level 
5.Part of Discrete Information from an Continuous Image

Colorspace models
1.RGB 
2.Grayscale 
3.Binary 

Distortion Types
1.JPEG
2.Gaussian White Noise (GWN)
3.Salt and Pepper noise (SP)
4.Multiplicative Speckle Noise (MSN)
5.Poisson Noise (PN)
